casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Byron Jerome PARKER 393P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2017 Ms. Michele A. Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Parker, Byron Jerome Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of November 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of November 2017."
